person.content:

| Person |

| ENGLISH F.A. |

* ENGLISH F.A. (as a person, not an organization)
* CUP (as a person, not a trophy)

Please note that the entities in the paragraph are not explicitly mentioned as people, but they are referred to in a personified way, hence they can be considered as "Person" entities.
